level.heading: Personal obligations of trustee.
level.text: Trust property is not subject to personal obligations of the trustee, even if the trustee becomes insolvent or bankrupt.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 15-104, see notes following ยง 19-1301.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 507 of the Uniform Trust Code. See 7C, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
